item.title: Open Source is a Cultural change
item.description: Few months ago, I attended to an international OpenSource Event in Madrid in order to discuss, as an Engineer at BBVA, with other collegues (from other kind of companies) about the open source and the relevance of that philosophy for enterprises to change the culture to be more agile.
